title: Deceptive Product: Seller's Misrepresentation on Amazon
body: 'I am extremely disappointed with the product I received from BuyFacturer/Torque. Despite multiple attempts to communicate the issue
column5: they are unwilling to accept that the product they delivered is different from what was shown on their Amazon listing.  The most noticeable discrepancies are with the curves of the handrest
column6: which are entirely different from the reference image on the Amazon listing. Additionally
column7: instead of receiving the four cushions
column9: and even those had a different color. The seats are also not as puffy and comfortable as depicted in the image on Amazon.  Even after providing clear images showcasing the differences
column10: the seller insists that the product is the same. This lack of acknowledgment and accountability is deeply concerning. It is evident that the company needs to improve its design quality and pay more attention to the details. Consumers like us should not be taken for granted.\xa0It is disheartening when a company makes commitments and then delivers something entirely different. I expected better from Torque/BuyFacturer
column11: and this experience has left me feeling deceived and frustrated.  To be frank
column14: and delivering on promises are fundamental to building trust with customers. I hope they will address this issue promptly and ensure that other customers do not face similar disappointments in the future.  Overall
column15: my experience with\xa0Torque/BuyFacturer has been unsatisfactory.'

title: 'Waste of money'
body: I will come to the point . 1. Sofa is very hard . 2. Back support is very bad. No high back support,only low and mid back . 3. It feels you are sitting in a chair. 4. No cushions provided . 5. Hand rest it not comfortable.  I don't know if there is any thing i liked about it.

title: 'Amazing sturdiness but defective'
body: Sturdiness is amazing. You won't get this sturdy built in this price range but if we talk about quality, then our piece is defective. We reached out to Torque customer service as we wanted a replacement with color change. Product does list 10 days replacement and this is why I ordered the product as it is my first online sofa, but it only allowed me to return it where in customer has to pack n SHIP this giant piece back to them. I always check return policies but I didn't for this as in my head how can customer ship this back so it would be covered only. The customer service brushed everything off saying it is on sale that is why, otherwise return pickup would have been included and also suggested us to shop directly from them instead. I never wanted my 26k being stuck so I kept this product. But not happy, everyday we see some new defect. Dealing with it.
